snippet.title: VolticPistol Accolades Trailer
snippet.description:
Check it out here:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1143570/VolticPistol/

VolitcPistol is a 2D medieval-cyberpunk platformer where you shoot or slice your way through your enemies. Every time you face death, your clone will reappear with a different set a stats, along with a different set of enemies to face. Each level will never be played the same way twice! The player will need to adapt to different stats and enemies to emerge at the top of the castle for victory!


Check out Sunset Arctic Games on Twitter: https://twitter.com/SunsetArctic
